name: Milky Way
features: Has a central supermassive black hole

name: Andromeda Galaxy
features: Nearest large galaxy to the Milky Way
Will collide with the Milky Way in billions of years
discovery: Observed by Abd al-Rahman al-Sufi in 964 AD

name: Orion Nebula
features: One of the brightest nebulae in the sky
discovery: Recorded by Nicolas-Claude Fabri de Peiresc in 1610
